Package cz.vse.java.utils.random

Class RandomStringGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.vse.java.utils.random.RandomStringGenerator
  • public class RandomStringGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

    The class for generating random Strings from given charset. The default is generating from all non-space characters.

    Written for project "Utils".
    Version:
    10. 02. 2020
    Author:
    Vojtěch Pavlů
    See Also:
    RandomEmailAddressGenerator, RandomNumberGenerator, String, StringBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • generateRandomString

        public java.lang.String generateRandomString​(int length)
                                      throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Generates random String with given length.
        Parameters:
        length - Length of the String
        Returns:
        Random String made of characters given in the charset.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When the length parameter is less than 0 or equals to 0.

      • generateRandomString

        public java.lang.String generateRandomString​(int minLength,
                                             int maxLength)
        Generates String with variable length in the given range.
        Parameters:
        minLength - Minimal length the result should have
        maxLength - Maximal length the result should have
        Returns:
        String with length in the range
